definition: Kunming prefecture-level city and capital of Yunnan province in southwest China
descendant/elder brother/a style of Chinese poetry
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
Kunming, prefecture-level city and capital of Yunnan province in southwest China
Kunming Lake

sentences.english: The Dianchi Lake plays an important role in the industrial and agricultural production of Kunming Metropolitan and the everyday life of the people.
sentences.chinese: 滇池在昆明地區工農業生產和民人生活中起重要作用。

sentences.english: After the War of Resistance Against Japan, Tsinghua University was removed from Kunming to Beiping in 1946.
sentences.chinese: 清華大學在抗戰勝利後的1946年由昆明遷回北平。

sentences.english: Spring City in Kunming is very cool.
Encased at the tip of each 25-foot-long rod are seeds provided by China’s Kunming Institute of Botany.
sentences.chinese: 每個25長的突觸頂端嵌有由昆明植物園提供的種子。

sentences.english: Wuhua Branch of the Kunming Quality and Technical Supervision Bureau …
sentences.chinese: “昆明市質量技術監督局五華分局”用英文怎麼說？

sentences.english: Kunming is a beautiful place. I'll go there some day.
sentences.chinese: 昆明是一個美麗的地方，有一天我會去那裏。

sentences.english: Look, Kunming lake surrounded by long embankment.
sentences.chinese: 看，昆明湖旁圍着長長地堤岸。

sentences.english: Kunming airport pick the contract after the signing of travel, freedom of movement.
sentences.chinese: 昆明機場接機後簽訂旅遊合同，自由活動。

sentences.english: But actually it is rather cold in winter.
sentences.chinese: 但事實上，昆明的冬天也有點寒冷。

sentences.english: The immunosuppression model was established by CTX injected into abdominal cavity of the KunMing Mus musculus albus.
sentences.chinese: 採用腹腔注射CTX誘導昆明小白鼠免疫抑制模型。

sentences.english: Since 1937, he had been teaching in The South-Western United University in Kunming.
sentences.chinese: 1937年抗戰開始，他在昆明西南聯大任教。

sentences.english: How many of you are from kunming?
sentences.chinese: 你們中有多少人是昆明人？

sentences.english: Hello, My name is BaoJiankun, I come from KunMing.
sentences.chinese: 你好，我叫保建昆，我來自昆明。

sentences.english: It is neither too cold nor too hot in Kunming ____ ____ ____ ____.
sentences.chinese: 在昆明，天氣一年到頭都是既不太冷也不太熱。

sentences.english: A survey was conducted among teachers in secondary schools in Kunming area.
sentences.chinese: 我們在昆明地區中學教師中進行了廣泛深入的調查。

sentences.english: The Kunming Lake is famous for its clean water.
sentences.chinese: 昆明湖以它淨淨的湖水著名於世。
